name: Alien Outbreak (itch)
description:
Alien Outbreak made for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Catch as many aliens as you can in the time limit

Controls

WASD - Move

Esc - Return to menu

Game Development Credits: Genesis & Snifferz. Snifferz - Music and level design. Genesis - Programming and 1st party 3D models

3rd party asset Credits: Karoosx, Thunderents, Broken vector, BORODAR, ,Pulsar Bytes, Synt Studios, DevilsWorkshop.
